ygData.subject: Re: Aviaks, Centaurs, etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: Aviaks and Centaurs can be found in South Karana. Someone told me that a GM told them you could NOT put the staff and skull together. Just a tip for people who
ygData.messageBody:
Aviaks and Centaurs can be found in South Karana. Someone told me that a
GM told them you could NOT put the staff and skull together. Just a tip for
people who don't know about this skull, do NOT us a 2H Blunt weapon
throughout the game. I had 67 in 2H blunt when I got my skull, and I had to
switch to piercing (which is now 14, blah). Anyone found Aviak Feathers yet?
We killed a whole bunch of Aviaks yesterday and got none.

Also, please try to keep the messages on topic. If you just have to send
a "my opinion is cooler than yours" email, make it personal.

Hiretsukan
22 Magician
Rellos Zek
